pages.text: He said, "O my boy! Tell not your vision to your brethren, for they will plot against you. Verily, Satan is to man an open foe

Thus your Lord will prefer you, and teach you the interpretation of events, and fulfil His favour upon you, and upon the family of Jacob, as He fulfiled it upon your two forefathers, Abraham and Isaac, before you. Verily, your Lord is Knowing, Wise
In Joseph and his brethren were signs to those who inquire (or seek Truth)
When they said, "Surely, Joseph and his brother are dearer to our father than we are, though we are many. Verily, our father is in obvious aberration (wandering in mind)
Slay Joseph, or cast him out to some (far or unknown) land; that your fatherÂ´s face (favour) may be free for you, and you may afterwards be a righteous folk
One from amongst them said, "Slay not Joseph, but, if you must act, throw him into the bottom of a pit; some caravan of travellers may pick him up
Said they, "O our father! What ails you that you will not trust us with Joseph seeing we are unto him sincere (well wishers)
Send him with us to-morrow to revel and to play, and, verily, we will take good care of him
Said he, "Verily, it grieves me that you should take him with you, for I fear lest the wolf devour him while you take no heed
Said they, "Why, if the wolf should devour him while we are so (strong) a band, verily, then we should ourselves have perished first
